trans-unit.source: While INLINE says “please inline me”, the INLINABLE says “feel free to inline me; use your discretion”. In other words the choice is left to GHC, which uses the same rules as for pragma-free functions. Unlike INLINE, that decision is made at the call site, and will therefore be affected by the inlining threshold, optimisation level etc.
trans-unit.target: 当 INLINE 说“请向我内联”时， INLINABLE 说“请随意向我内联；自行决定”。换句话说，选择权留给了GHC，它使用与无编译功能相同的规则。与 INLINE 不同，该决定是在呼叫站点做出的，因此会受到内联阈值，优化级别等的影响。

trans-unit.source: While Safe Haskell is an extension, it actually runs in the background for every compilation with GHC. It does this to track the type violations of modules to infer their safety, even when they aren’t explicitly using Safe Haskell. Please refer to section Safe Haskell Inference for more details of this.
trans-unit.target: 尽管Safe Haskell是扩展，但实际上它在GHC的每次编译中都在后台运行。它这样做是为了跟踪模块的类型冲突，以推断其安全性，即使它们未明确使用Safe Haskell也是如此。有关更多详细信息，请参阅“ 安全Haskell推论”部分。

trans-unit.source: While a primary use case of Safe Haskell is running untrusted code, Safe Haskell doesn’t provide this directly. Instead, Safe Haskell provides strict type safety. Without Safe Haskell, GHC allows many exceptions to the type system which can subvert any abstractions. By providing strict type safety, Safe Haskell enables developers to build their own library level sandbox mechanisms to run untrusted code.
trans-unit.target: 尽管Safe Haskell的主要用例正在运行不受信任的代码，但Safe Haskell不会直接提供此代码。相反，Safe Haskell提供了严格的类型安全性。没有Safe Haskell，GHC会允许类型系统有许多异常，这些异常可以颠覆任何抽象。通过提供严格的类型安全性，Safe Haskell使开发人员能够构建自己的库级别沙箱机制来运行不受信任的代码。

trans-unit.source: While a standalone kind signature determines the kind of a type constructor, it does not determine its arity. This is of particular importance for type families and type synonyms, as they cannot be partially applied. See Type family declarations for more information about arity.

trans-unit.source: Why do both readsPrec and readPrec exist, and why does GHC opt to implement readPrec in derived Read instances instead of readsPrec? The reason is that readsPrec is based on the ReadS type, and although ReadS is mentioned in the Haskell 2010 Report, it is not a very efficient parser data structure.

trans-unit.source: Why do we need this? Because if a foreign library is called from a thread created using forkIO, it won't have access to any thread-local state - state variables that have specific values for each OS thread (see POSIX's pthread_key_create or Win32's TlsAlloc). Therefore, some libraries (OpenGL, for example) will not work from a thread created using forkIO. They work fine in threads created using forkOS or when called from main or from a foreign export.
trans-unit.target: 我们为什么需要这个？因为如果从使用 forkIO 创建的线程中调用外部库，则它将无法访问任何线程局部状态 -具有每个OS线程特定值的状态变量（请参阅POSIX的 pthread_key_create 或Win32的 TlsAlloc ）。因此，某些库（例如OpenGL）将无法通过使用 forkIO 创建的线程运行。在使用 forkOS 创建的线程中，或者从 main 或从 foreign export 调用时，它们可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Why should we want to run compiled code? Well, compiled code is roughly 10x faster than interpreted code, but takes about 2x longer to produce (perhaps longer if optimisation is on). So it pays to compile the parts of a program that aren’t changing very often, and use the interpreter for the code being actively developed.
trans-unit.target: 我们为什么要运行已编译的代码？好的，编译后的代码比解释后的代码快大约10倍，但生成时间要长大约2倍（如果启用了优化，则可能会更长）。因此，需要编译不经常更改的程序部分，并对正在积极开发的代码使用解释器，这是值得的。

trans-unit.source: With GHC, the ByteString representation uses pinned memory, meaning it cannot be moved by the GC. This is usually the right thing to do for larger strings, but for small strings using pinned memory can lead to heap fragmentation which wastes space. The ShortByteString type (and the Text type from the text package) use unpinned memory so they do not contribute to heap fragmentation. In addition, with GHC, small unpinned strings are allocated in the same way as normal heap allocations, rather than in a separate pinned area.
trans-unit.target: 对于GHC， ByteString 表示形式使用固定内存，这意味着GC无法移动它。对于较大的字符串，通常这样做是正确的，但是对于固定字符串的较小的字符串，可能会导致堆碎片，从而浪费空间。该 ShortByteString 型（和 Text 从类型 text 包）使用的未锁定的记忆，使他们不至堆碎片贡献。此外，使用GHC时，小的固定字符串以与普通堆分配相同的方式分配，而不是在单独的固定区域中分配。

trans-unit.source: With kind polymorphism, there is quite a bit going on behind the scenes that may be invisible to a Haskell programmer. GHC supports several flags that control how types are printed in error messages and at the GHCi prompt. See the discussion of type pretty-printing options for further details. If you are using kind polymorphism and are confused as to why GHC is rejecting (or accepting) your program, we encourage you to turn on these flags, especially -fprint-explicit-kinds.
trans-unit.target: 对于善良的多态性，Haskell程序员可能看不到幕后发生的很多事情。GHC支持几个标志，这些标志控制如何在错误消息中以及在GHCi提示符下打印类型。有关更多详细信息，请参见类型漂亮打印选项的讨论。如果您使用的是实物多态性，并且对GHC为什么拒绝（或接受）程序感到困惑，我们建议您打开这些标志，尤其是 -fprint-explicit-kinds 。

trans-unit.source: With multiple modules in scope, especially multiple *-form modules, it is likely that name clashes will occur. Haskell specifies that name clashes are only reported when an ambiguous identifier is used, and GHCi behaves in the same way for expressions typed at the prompt.
trans-unit.target: 如果作用域中有多个模块，尤其是多个 * 形式的模块，则可能会发生名称冲突。Haskell指定仅当使用不明确的标识符时才报告名称冲突，并且GHCi对于在提示符下键入的表达式具有相同的行为。

trans-unit.source: With only 1 generation (e.g. -G1, see -G ⟨generations⟩) the -A option specifies the minimum allocation area, since the actual size of the allocation area will be resized according to the amount of data in the heap (see -F ⟨factor⟩, below).
trans-unit.target: 仅使用1代（例如 -G1 ，请参见 -G ⟨generations⟩ ）， -A 选项指定最小分配区域，因为分配区域的实际大小将根据堆中的数据量进行调整（请参见 -F ⟨factor⟩ ，如下）。

trans-unit.source: With some exceptions (see below), the file will be created securely in the sense that an attacker should not be able to cause openTempFile to overwrite another file on the filesystem using your credentials, by putting symbolic links (on Unix) in the place where the temporary file is to be created. On Unix the O_CREAT and O_EXCL flags are used to prevent this attack, but note that O_EXCL is sometimes not supported on NFS filesystems, so if you rely on this behaviour it is best to use local filesystems only.
trans-unit.target: 除某些例外情况（请参阅下文）外，安全地创建文件的方式是，攻击者不应使用您的凭据通过将符号链接（在Unix上）放在以下位置，从而导致openTempFile覆盖文件系统上的另一个文件临时文件将被创建。在Unix上，使用 O_CREAT 和 O_EXCL 标志来防止这种攻击，但是请注意，NFS文件系统有时不支持 O_EXCL ，因此，如果您依赖于此行为，则最好仅使用本地文件系统。

trans-unit.source: With the Arrows extension, GHC supports the arrow notation described in the second of these papers, translating it using combinators from the Control.Arrow module. What follows is a brief introduction to the notation; it won’t make much sense unless you’ve read Hughes’s paper.
trans-unit.target: 通过 Arrows 扩展，GHC支持本文第二篇中介绍的箭头符号，并使用Control.Arrow模块中的组合器对其进行翻译。以下是该符号的简要介绍；除非您阅读过休斯的论文，否则这没有多大意义。

trans-unit.source: With the Arrows extension, GHC supports the arrow notation described in the second of these papers, translating it using combinators from the Control.Arrow module. What follows is a brief introduction to the notation; it won’t make much sense unless you’ve read Hughes’s paper.

trans-unit.source: With the RankNTypes extension (Lexically scoped type variables), it is possible to declare type arguments somewhere other than the beginning of a type. For example, we can have pair :: forall a. a -> forall b. b -> (a, b) and then say pair @Bool True @Char which would have type Char -> (Bool, Char).
trans-unit.target: 使用 RankNTypes 扩展（按词法定义的类型变量），可以在类型开头之外的其他地方声明类型参数。例如，我们可以具有 pair :: forall a. a -> forall b. b -> (a, b) ，然后说 pair @Bool True @Char ，其类型为 Char -> (Bool, Char) 。

trans-unit.source: With the declaration of (:~~:) above, it gets kind forall k1 k2. k1 -> k2 -> Type. Thus, the type (:~~:) a has kind k2 -> Type for some k2. GHC cannot then regeneralize this kind to become forall k2. k2 -> Type as desired. Thus, the instance is rejected as ill-kinded.
trans-unit.target: 有了上面的 (:~~:) 声明，它对于所有 forall k1 k2. k1 -> k2 -> Type 。因此，类型 (:~~:) a 种类为 k2 -> Type 某些 k2 的类型。然后，GHC无法将这种类型的 forall k2. k2 -> Type 重新合成为永久k2。k2->根据需要键入。因此，该实例被拒绝为不良实例。

trans-unit.source: With the language extension UndecidableSuperClasses GHC lifts all restrictions on superclass constraints. If there really is a loop, GHC will only expand it to finite depth.

trans-unit.source: Within reason, more memory for heap space means less garbage collection for GHC, which means less compilation time. If you use the -Rghc-timing option, you’ll get a garbage-collector report. (Again, you can use the cheap-and-nasty +RTS -S -RTS option to send the GC stats straight to standard error.)
trans-unit.target: 在一定程度上，堆空间的更多内存意味着GHC的垃圾回收更少，这意味着更少的编译时间。如果使用 -Rghc-timing 选项，将获得垃圾收集器报告。（同样，您可以使用便宜的 +RTS -S -RTS 选项将GC统计信息直接发送到标准错误。）

trans-unit.source: Within this module, many functions construct a Text from one or more Char values. trans-unit.source: Without PolyKinds, GHC refuses to generalise over kind variables. It thus defaults kind variables to Type when possible; when this is not possible, an error is issued.

trans-unit.source: Without lifting a finger, the ?cmp parameter is propagated to become a parameter of least as well. With explicit parameters, the default is that parameters must always be explicit propagated. With implicit parameters, the default is to always propagate them.

Worker-wrapper removes unused arguments, but usually we do not remove them all, lest it turn a function closure into a thunk, thereby perhaps creating a space leak and/or disrupting inlining. This flag allows worker/wrapper to remove all value lambdas.
trans-unit.target: Worker-wrapper会删除未使用的参数，但是通常我们不会全部删除它们，以免将函数关闭变成笨拙的东西，从而可能造成空间泄漏和/或破坏内联。此标志允许工作程序/包装程序删除所有值lambda。

trans-unit.source: Wrap an IO computation to time out and return Nothing in case no result is available within n microseconds (1/10^6 seconds). In case a result is available before the timeout expires, Just a is returned. A negative timeout interval means "wait indefinitely". When specifying long timeouts, be careful not to exceed maxBound :: Int.
trans-unit.target: 包装 IO 计算以超时，如果在 n 微秒（ 1/10^6 秒）内没有结果可用，则返回 Nothing 。如果在超时之前有结果可用，则 Just a 返回a。负的超时间隔表示“无限期等待”。指定长时间超时时，请注意不要超过 maxBound :: Int 。

trans-unit.source: You can make stdin reset itself after every evaluation by giving GHCi the command :set +r. This works because stdin is just a top-level expression that can be reverted to its unevaluated state in the same way as any other top-level expression (CAF).
trans-unit.target: 您可以在每次评估后通过给GHCi命令 :set +r 来使 stdin 自身复位。之所以 stdin 是因为stdin只是一个顶级表达式，可以以与其他任何顶级表达式（CAF）相同的方式还原到其未评估状态。

trans-unit.source: You can only attach to entities declared at top level in the module being compiled, and you can only use unqualified names in the list of entities. A capitalised name, such as T refers to either the type constructor Tor the data constructor T, or both if both are in scope. If both are in scope, there is currently no way to specify one without the other (c.f. fixities Infix type constructors, classes, and type variables).
trans-unit.target: 您只能附加到正在编译的模块中顶层声明的实体，并且只能在实体列表中使用不合格的名称。大写名称，如 T 是指任一类型构造 T 或数据构造 T 或两者如果两者都在范围内。如果两者都在范围内，则当前无法指定一个而不指定另一个（参见fixities Infix类型构造函数，类和类型变量）。

trans-unit.source: You can only run a function at compile time if it is imported from another module that is not part of a mutually-recursive group of modules that includes the module currently being compiled. Furthermore, all of the modules of the mutually-recursive group must be reachable by non-SOURCE imports from the module where the splice is to be run.
trans-unit.target: 如果函数是从另一个模块导入的，则该函数只能在编译时运行，而该模块不是包含当前正在编译的模块的相互递归模块组的一部分。此外，非递归组中的所有模块都必须可以通过非源导入从要运行拼接的模块中访问。

trans-unit.source: You can only run a function at compile time if it is imported from another module. That is, you can’t define a function in a module, and call it from within a splice in the same module. (It would make sense to do so, but it’s hard to implement.)
trans-unit.target: 如果功能是从另一个模块导入的，则只能在编译时运行。也就是说，您不能在模块中定义函数，而只能在同一模块的接头内调用它。（这样做很有意义，但是很难实现。）

You can safely replace all the import declarations in M.hs with those found in its respective .imports file. Why would you want to do that? Because the “minimal” imports (a) import everything explicitly, by name, and (b) import nothing that is not required. It can be quite painful to maintain this property by hand, so this flag is intended to reduce the labour.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将 M.hs 所有导入声明安全地替换为其相应的 .imports 文件中的声明。你为什么想这么做？因为“最小”导入（a）按名称显式导入所有内容，并且（b）不导入不需要的任何内容。用手维护此属性可能会很痛苦，因此此标志旨在减少人工。

trans-unit.source: You should think of the object file and the interface file as a pair, since the interface file is in a sense a compiler-readable description of the contents of the object file. If the interface file and object file get out of sync for any reason, then the compiler may end up making assumptions about the object file that aren’t true; trouble will almost certainly follow. For this reason, we recommend keeping object files and interface files in the same place (GHC does this by default, but it is possible to override the defaults as we’ll explain shortly).
trans-unit.target: 您应该将目标文件和接口文件视为一对，因为从某种意义上说，接口文件是目标文件内容的编译器可读描述。如果接口文件和目标文件由于某种原因不同步，那么编译器可能最终会做出关于目标文件的假设，而这些假设是不正确的。麻烦几乎肯定会随之而来。因此，我们建议将目标文件和接口文件放在同一位置（GHC默认情况下会这样做，但是有可能覆盖默认值，我们将在稍后解释）。

trans-unit.source: [Example: -n4m ] When set to a non-zero value, this option divides the allocation area (-A value) into chunks of the specified size. During execution, when a processor exhausts its current chunk, it is given another chunk from the pool until the pool is exhausted, at which point a collection is triggered.
trans-unit.target: [示例： -n4m ]当设置为非零值时，此选项将分配区域（ -A 值）划分为指定大小的块。在执行期间，当处理器耗尽其当前块时，会从池中为其分配另一个块，直到该池耗尽为止，然后触发集合。

trans-unit.source: \( O(1) \). Add an element to the left end of a sequence. Mnemonic: a triangle with the single element at the pointy end.
trans-unit.target: \（O（1）\）。在序列的左端添加一个元素。助记符：尖端位于单个元素的三角形。

trans-unit.source: \( O(1) \). Add an element to the right end of a sequence. Mnemonic: a triangle with the single element at the pointy end.
trans-unit.target: \（O（1）\）。在序列的右端添加一个元素。助记符：尖端位于单个元素的三角形。

trans-unit.source: \( O(1) \). Analyse the left end of a sequence.
\( O(1) \). Analyse the right end of a sequence.
\( O(1) \). Is this the empty sequence?
\( O(1) \). The number of elements in the sequence.
\( O(\log n) \). replicate n x is a sequence consisting of n copies of x.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log n）\）。 replicate n x 是由 x 的 n 个副本组成的序列。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). insertAt i x xs inserts x into xs at the index i, shifting the rest of the sequence over.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log（\ min（i，ni）））\）。 insertAt i x xs 在索引 i 处将 x 插入 xs ，将序列的其余部分移到上方。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). A flipped, infix version of lookup.
\( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). Delete the element of a sequence at a given index. Return the original sequence if the index is out of range.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log（\ min（i，ni）））\）。删除给定索引处序列的元素。如果索引超出范围，则返回原始序列。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). Elements of a sequence after the first i. If i is negative, drop i s yields the whole sequence. If the sequence contains fewer than i elements, the empty sequence is returned.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log（\ min（i，ni）））\）。第一个 i 之后的序列的元素。如果 i 是负的， drop i s 收益率整个序列。如果序列包含的元素少于 i 个，则返回空序列。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). Replace the element at the specified position. If the position is out of range, the original sequence is returned.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log（\ min（i，ni）））\）。在指定位置替换元素。如果位置超出范围，则返回原始序列。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). Split a sequence at a given position. splitAt i s = (take i s, drop i s).
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log（\ min（i，ni）））\）。在给定位置分割序列。 splitAt i s = (take i s, drop i s) 。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). The element at the specified position, counting from 0. If the specified position is negative or at least the length of the sequence, lookup returns Nothing.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log（\ min（i，ni）））\）。指定位置的元素，从0开始计数。如果指定位置为负或至少为序列长度，则 lookup 返回 Nothing 。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). The element at the specified position, counting from 0. If the specified position is negative or at least the length of the sequence, lookup returns Nothing.

\( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). The element at the specified position, counting from 0. The argument should thus be a non-negative integer less than the size of the sequence. If the position is out of range, index fails with an error.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log（\ min（i，ni）））\）。指定位置的元素，从0开始计数。因此，参数应为小于序列大小的非负整数。如果位置超出范围， index 失败并显示错误。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). The first i elements of a sequence. If i is negative, take i s yields the empty sequence. If the sequence contains fewer than i elements, the whole sequence is returned.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log（\ min（i，ni）））\）。序列的前 i 个元素。如果 i 为负，则 take i s 空序列。如果序列包含的元素少于 i 个，则返回整个序列。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). Update the element at the specified position. If the position is out of range, the original sequence is returned. adjust can lead to poor performance and even memory leaks, because it does not force the new value before installing it in the sequence. adjust' should usually be preferred.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log（\ min（i，ni）））\）。在指定位置更新元素。如果位置超出范围，则返回原始序列。 adjust 可能会导致性能下降，甚至导致内存泄漏，因为在按顺序安装新值之前，它不会强制执行该值。通常应优先选择 adjust' 。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\log(\min(i,n-i))) \). Update the element at the specified position. If the position is out of range, the original sequence is returned. The new value is forced before it is installed in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ log（\ min（i，ni）））\）。在指定位置更新元素。如果位置超出范围，则返回原始序列。在按顺序安装新值之前，将强制使用该值。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\min(n_1,n_2)) \). zip takes two sequences and returns a sequence of corresponding pairs. If one input is short, excess elements are discarded from the right end of the longer sequence.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ min（n_1，n_2））\）。 zip 接受两个序列，并返回一个对应对的序列。如果一个输入短，则从较长序列的右端丢弃多余的元素。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\min(n_1,n_2)) \). zipWith generalizes zip by zipping with the function given as the first argument, instead of a tupling function. For example, zipWith (+) is applied to two sequences to take the sequence of corresponding sums.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ min（n_1，n_2））\）。 zipWith 通过使用给定的函数作为第一个参数而不是tupling函数对 zip 进行泛化。例如，将 zipWith (+) 应用于两个序列以获取相应总和的序列。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\min(n_1,n_2,n_3)) \). zip3 takes three sequences and returns a sequence of triples, analogous to zip.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ min（n_1，n_2，n_3））\）。 zip3 接受三个序列，并返回一个类似于 zip 的三元组序列。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\min(n_1,n_2,n_3)) \). zipWith3 takes a function which combines three elements, as well as three sequences and returns a sequence of their point-wise combinations, analogous to zipWith.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ min（n_1，n_2，n_3））\）。 zipWith3 包含一个将三个元素以及三个序列组合在一起的函数，并返回它们逐点组合的序列，类似于 zipWith 。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\min(n_1,n_2,n_3,n_4)) \). zip4 takes four sequences and returns a sequence of quadruples, analogous to zip.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ min（n_1，n_2，n_3，n_4））\）。 zip4 接受四个序列，并返回一个类似于 zip 的四倍序列。

trans-unit.source: \( O(\min(n_1,n_2,n_3,n_4)) \). zipWith4 takes a function which combines four elements, as well as four sequences and returns a sequence of their point-wise combinations, analogous to zipWith.
trans-unit.target: \（O（\ min（n_1，n_2，n_3，n_4））\）。 zipWith4 包含一个将四个元素以及四个序列组合在一起的函数，并返回它们逐点组合的序列，类似于 zipWith 。

trans-unit.source: \( O(i) \) where \( i \) is the breakpoint index. breakl, applied to a predicate p and a sequence xs, returns a pair whose first element is the longest prefix (possibly empty) of xs of elements that do not satisfyp and the second element is the remainder of the sequence.
trans-unit.target: \（O（i）\）其中\（i \）是断点索引。应用于谓词 p 和序列 xs 的 breakl 返回一个对，该对的第一个元素是不满足 p 的元素的 xs 的最长前缀（可能为空），第二个元素是序列的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: \( O(i) \) where \( i \) is the prefix length. dropWhileL p xs returns the suffix remaining after takeWhileL p xs.
trans-unit.target: \（O（i）\）其中\（i \）是前缀长度。 dropWhileL p xs 返回 takeWhileL p xs 之后剩余的后缀。

trans-unit.source: \( O(i) \) where \( i \) is the prefix length. spanl, applied to a predicate p and a sequence xs, returns a pair whose first element is the longest prefix (possibly empty) of xs of elements that satisfy p and the second element is the remainder of the sequence.
trans-unit.target: \（O（i）\）其中\（i \）是前缀长度。 spanl 应用于谓词 p 和序列 xs ，返回一对其第一个元素是满足 p 的元素的 xs 的最长前缀（可能为空），而第二个元素是该序列的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: \( O(i) \) where \( i \) is the prefix length. takeWhileL, applied to a predicate p and a sequence xs, returns the longest prefix (possibly empty) of xs of elements that satisfy p.
trans-unit.target: \（O（i）\）其中\（i \）是前缀长度。 takeWhileL 应用于谓词 p 和序列 xs ，返回满足 p 的元素 xs 的最长前缀（可能为空）。

trans-unit.source: \( O(i) \) where \( i \) is the suffix length. dropWhileR p xs returns the prefix remaining after takeWhileR p xs.

trans-unit.source: \( O(i) \) where \( i \) is the suffix length. spanr, applied to a predicate p and a sequence xs, returns a pair whose first element is the longest suffix (possibly empty) of xs of elements that satisfy p and the second element is the remainder of the sequence.
trans-unit.target: \（O（i）\）其中\（i \）是后缀长度。 spanr 应用于谓词 p 和序列 xs ，返回一对其第一个元素是满足 p 的元素的 xs 的最长后缀（可能为空），而第二个元素是序列的其余部分。

trans-unit.source: \( O(i) \) where \( i \) is the suffix length. takeWhileR, applied to a predicate p and a sequence xs, returns the longest suffix (possibly empty) of xs of elements that satisfy p.
trans-unit.target: \（O（i）\）其中\（i \）是后缀长度。 takeWhileR 应用于谓词 p 和序列 xs ，返回满足 p 的元素的 xs 的最长后缀（可能为空）。

trans-unit.source: \( O(n \log d) \). The nubOrd function removes duplicate elements from a list. In particular, it keeps only the first occurrence of each element. By using a Set internally it has better asymptotics than the standard nub function.
trans-unit.target: \（O（n \ log d）\）。该 nubOrd 功能从列表中移除重复的元素。特别是，它仅保留每个元素的第一次出现。通过在内部使用 Set ,它比标准的 nub 函数具有更好的渐近性。

trans-unit.source: \( O(n \log d) \). The nubOrd function removes duplicate elements from a list. In particular, it keeps only the first occurrence of each element. By using a Set internally it has better asymptotics than the standard nub function.
\( O(n \log n) \). sort sorts the specified Seq by the natural ordering of its elements. The sort is stable. If stability is not required, unstableSort can be slightly faster.
trans-unit.target: \（O（n \ log n）\）。 sort 按其元素的自然顺序对指定的 Seq 进行排序。排序是稳定的。如果不需要稳定性，则 unstableSort 可能会稍快一些。

trans-unit.source: \( O(n \log n) \). sortBy sorts the specified Seq according to the specified comparator. The sort is stable. If stability is not required, unstableSortBy can be slightly faster.
trans-unit.target: \（O（n \ log n）\）。 sortBy 根据指定的比较器对指定的 Seq 进行排序。排序是稳定的。如果不需要稳定性，则 unstableSortBy 可能会稍快一些。

trans-unit.source: \( O(n \log n) \). sortOn sorts the specified Seq by comparing the results of a key function applied to each element. sortOn f is equivalent to sortBy (compare `on` f), but has the performance advantage of only evaluating f once for each element in the input list. This is called the decorate-sort-undecorate paradigm, or Schwartzian transform.
trans-unit.target: \（O（n \ log n）\）。 sortOn 通过比较应用于每个元素的键函数的结果对指定的 Seq 进行排序。 sortOn f 相当于 sortBy (compare `on` f) ，但具有仅评估性能优势 f 一次输入列表中的每个元素。这称为“装饰-排序-不装饰”范式或Schwartzian变换。

trans-unit.source: \( O(n \log n) \). sortOn sorts the specified Seq by comparing the results of a key function applied to each element. sortOn f is equivalent to sortBy (compare `on` f), but has the performance advantage of only evaluating f once for each element in the input list. trans-unit.source: a suffix of //ROUNDTRIP will use a PEP383-style escape mechanism to represent any invalid bytes in the input as Unicode codepoints (specifically, as lone surrogates, which are normally invalid in UTF-32). Upon output, these special codepoints are detected and turned back into the corresponding original byte.
trans-unit.target: //ROUNDTRIP 的后缀将使用PEP383样式的转义机制将输入中的任何无效字节表示为Unicode代码点（特别是作为单独的替代，通常在UTF-32中是无效的）。在输出时，将检测这些特殊代码点并将其转回相应的原始字节。

trans-unit.source: a version of arctangent taking two real floating-point arguments. For real floating x and y, atan2 y x computes the angle (from the positive x-axis) of the vector from the origin to the point (x,y). atan2 y x returns a value in the range [-pi, pi]. It follows the Common Lisp semantics for the origin when signed zeroes are supported. atan2 y 1, with y in a type that is RealFloat, should return the same value as atan y. A default definition of atan2 is provided, but implementors can provide a more accurate implementation.
trans-unit.target: 一个带有两个实浮点参数的反正切版本。对于实数浮点 x 和 y ， atan2 y x 计算向量从原点到点 (x,y) 的角度（从正x轴开始）。 atan2 y x 返回[ -pi ， pi ] 范围内的值。当支持带符号的零时，它遵循起源的Common Lisp语义。 atan2 y 1 ，与 y 在类型即 RealFloat ，应返回相同的值 atan y 。 atan2 的默认定义 提供了，但实现者可以提供更准确的实现。

trans-unit.source: a version of arctangent taking two real floating-point arguments. For real floating x and y, atan2 y x computes the angle (from the positive x-axis) of the vector from the origin to the point (x,y). atan2 y x returns a value in the range [-pi, pi]. It follows the Common Lisp semantics for the origin when signed zeroes are supported. atan2 y 1, with y in a type that is RealFloat, should return the same value as atan y. A default definition of atan2 is provided, but implementors can provide a more accurate implementation.
trans-unit.target: 一个带有两个实浮点参数的反正切版本。对于实数浮点 x 和 y ， atan2 y x 计算向量从原点到点 (x,y) 的角度（从正x轴开始）。 atan2 y x 返回[ -pi ， pi ] 范围内的值。当支持带符号的零时，它遵循起源的Common Lisp语义。 atan2 y 1 ，与 y 在类型即 RealFloat ，应返回相同的值 atan y 。 atan2 的默认定义 提供了，但实现者可以提供更准确的实现。

trans-unit.source: asynchronous: the actual putMVar may be performed after the call returns (for example, if the RTS is currently garbage collecting). trans-unit.target: 异步：实际的putMVar可以在调用返回后执行（例如，如果RTS当前正在垃圾回收）。这就是为什么 hs_try_putmvar() 不返回结果来说明放置是否成功的原因。确保 MVar 为空是您的责任；如果已满，则 hs_try_putmvar() 将无效。
